Uses of Class
com.github.mob41.kmbeta.exception.DatabaseNotLoadedException

  • Packages that use DatabaseNotLoadedException 
    Package Description
    com.github.mob41.kmbeta.api  

    • Uses of DatabaseNotLoadedException in com.github.mob41.kmbeta.api

      Methods in com.github.mob41.kmbeta.api that throw DatabaseNotLoadedException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Route> BusDatabase.getBusStopRoutes(java.lang.String stopcode)
      Get all routes related to the specified bus stop code (Sub-area)

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
      int BusDatabase.getRouteIndex(java.lang.String bus_no)
      Get the index inside the routes' names.

      Returns -1 if the specified name isn't found.
      java.lang.String BusDatabase.getStopCodeFromStopName(java.lang.String routeName, java.lang.String stopname)
      Gets the stop code from a stop name (Chinese or English)

      Returns null if the specified stop name wasn't found.

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
      java.lang.String BusDatabase.getStopNameInEnglishFromStopCode(java.lang.String routeName, java.lang.String stopcode)
      Gets the stop name in English from a stop code

      Returns null if the specified stop code wasn't found.

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
      int BusDatabase.getStopSequence(java.lang.String routeName, int boundIndex, java.lang.String stopcode)
      Gets the stop sequence from a stop code

      Returns -1 if the specified stop code wasn't found.

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
